name: Wagon Train 1848
overview: Wagon train 1848 is an adventure in cooperative learning based on The Oregon Trail game. It allowed a classroom full of students to all be part of the same multiplayer adventure. Each Mac computer represents a covered wagon train traveling west on the Oregon Trail. Players work together, as they journey across the rugged landscape of nineteenth-century America. Wagon Train 1848 was the first version of Oregon Trail of Apple's Macintosh computers. It was released at the same time as the Mac version of the Oregon Trail, but it was only available to schools.
